mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM_INFO1 ( ROOM_NUM, ROOM_TYPE, BUILDING_TYPE, MONTHLY_PAYMENT, MONTHLY_DEPOSIT, JEONSE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ZIPCODE, TRADE_TYPE, MEM_ID ) VALUES ( ROOM_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ROOM_TYPE}, #{BUILDING_TYPE}, #{MONTHLY_PAYMENT}, #{MONTHLY_DEPOSIT}, #{JEONSE}, #{ADDRESS1}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{ZIPCODE}, #{TRADE_TYPE}, #{MEM_ID} )

INSERT INTO ROOM_INFO2 ( ROOM_NUM, SUPPLY_SIZE, REAL_SIZE, BUILDING_STORY, ROOM_FLOOR, HEATING_SYSTEM, MOVE_IN_DATE, UTILITY_CHECK, UTILITY_PRICE, UTILITY_TYPE, PARKING, PARKING_BILL, PET, ELEVATOR, BALCONY, BUILT_IN, STRUCTURES, OPTIONS, LOAN_ACCESS, DESC_TITLE, DESC_DETAIL, DESC_SECRET ) VALUES ( ROOM_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{SUPPLY_SIZE}, #{REAL_SIZE}, #{BUILDING_STORY}, #{ROOM_FLOOR}, #{HEATING_SYSTEM}, #{MOVE_IN_DATE}, #{UTILITY_CHECK}, #{UTILITY_PRICE}, #{UTILITY_TYPE}, #{PARKING}, #{PARKING_BILL}, #{PET}, #{ELEVATOR}, #{BALCONY}, #{BUILT_IN}, #{STRUCTURES}, #{OPTIONS}, #{LOAN_ACCESS}, #{DESC_TITLE}, #{DESC_DETAIL}, #{DESC_SECRET} )

INSERT INTO ROOM_BOARD ( ROOM_NUM, BOARD_NUM, TRADE_STATUS, EXPIRATION_DATE, HIT_COUNT, FAV_COUNT, DEL_GB, UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES ( ROOM_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, ROOM_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, '광고중', sysdate+30, 0, 0, 'N', SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO ROOM_FILES ( FILE_NUM, ROOM_NUM, ORG_NAME, STD_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( FILE_NUM_SEQ, ROOM_NUM_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{ORG_NAME}, #{STD_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{CREA_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_INFO1 SET THUMBNAIL = ( SELECT STD_NAME FROM ROOM_FILES WHERE FILE_NUM = ( SELECT min(FILE_NUM) FROM ROOM_FILES WHERE ROOM_NUM = #{ROOM_NUM} AND FILE_DEL = 'N' ) ) WHERE ROOM_NUM = #{ROOM_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT R1.MEM_ID, R1.ROOM_NUM, R1.TRADE_TYPE,R1.BUILDING_TYPE,R1.ADDRESS1, R1.ADDRESS2, R1.ZIPCODE, R1.MONTHLY_PAYMENT, R1.MONTHLY_DEPOSIT, R1.JEONSE,R1.MEM_ID, R1.THUMBNAIL, R2.UTILITY_CHECK, R2.UTILITY_PRICE, R2.UTILITY_TYPE,R2.SUPPLY_SIZE, R2.REAL_SIZE, R2.ROOM_FLOOR,R2.STRUCTURES, R2.PARKING,R2.PET, R2.ELEVATOR,R2.BALCONY, R2.BUILT_IN, R2.OPTIONS, R2.LOAN_ACCESS,RB.BOARD_NUM,R2.DESC_SECRET, RB.EXPIRATION_DATE, RB.HIT_COUNT, RB.FAV_COUNT, RB.TRADE_STATUS, RB.UPLOAD_DATE, RB.DEL_GB FROM ROOM_INFO1 R1, ROOM_INFO2 R2, ROOM_BOARD RB WHERE R1.ROOM_NUM = R2.ROOM_NUM AND R1.ROOM_NUM = RB.ROOM_NUM AND DEL_GB='N' AND MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
SELECT count(*) FROM ROOM_BOARD rb, ROOM_INFO1 r1 WHERE rb.ROOM_NUM=r1.ROOM_NUM and rb.DEL_GB='N' and r1.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}

SELECT R1.MEM_ID, R1.ROOM_NUM, R1.TRADE_TYPE,R1.BUILDING_TYPE,R1.ADDRESS1, R1.ADDRESS2, R1.ZIPCODE, R1.MONTHLY_PAYMENT, R1.MONTHLY_DEPOSIT, R1.JEONSE,R1.MEM_ID, R2.DESC_SECRET, R2.SUPPLY_SIZE, R2.REAL_SIZE, R2.BUILDING_STORY, R2.ROOM_FLOOR, R2.HEATING_SYSTEM, R2.MOVE_IN_DATE, R2.UTILITY_CHECK, R2.UTILITY_PRICE, R2.UTILITY_TYPE, R2.PARKING, R2.PARKING_BILL, R2.PET, R2.ELEVATOR, R2.BALCONY, R2.BUILT_IN, R2.STRUCTURES, R2.OPTIONS, R2.LOAN_ACCESS, R2.DESC_TITLE, R2.DESC_DETAIL, RB.BOARD_NUM, RB.EXPIRATION_DATE, RB.HIT_COUNT, RB.FAV_COUNT, RB.TRADE_STATUS, RB.UPLOAD_DATE, RB.DEL_GB FROM ROOM_INFO1 R1, ROOM_INFO2 R2, ROOM_BOARD RB WHERE R1.ROOM_NUM= R2.ROOM_NUM AND R1.ROOM_NUM=RB.ROOM_NUM AND DEL_GB='N' AND R1.ROOM_NUM=#{ROOM_NUM}
SELECT ROOM_NUM, ORG_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM ROOM_FILES WHERE ROOM_NUM = #{ROOM_NUM} AND FILE_DEL = 'N'
mapper.update: update ROOM_BOARD set hit_count=nvl(hit_count,0)+1 where ROOM_NUM=#{ROOM_NUM}

update ROOM_INFO1 R1, ROOM_INFO2 R2, ROOM_BOARD RB set R1.TRADE_TYPE=#{R1.TRADE_TYPE, R1.BUILDING_TYPE=#{R1.BUILDING_TYPE}, R1.ADDRESS1=#{R1.ADDRESS1}, R1.ADDRESS2=#{R1.ADDRESS2}, R1.ZIPCODE=#{R1.ZIPCODE}, R1.MONTHLY_PAYMENT=#{R1.MONTHLY_PAYMENT}, R1.MONTHLY_DEPOSIT=#{R1.MONTHLY_DEPOSIT}, R1.JEONSE=#{R1.JEONSE}, R1.THUMBNAIL=#{R1.THUMBNAIL}, R2.UTILITY_CHECK=#{R2.UTILITY_CHECK}, R2.UTILITY_PRICE=#{R2.UTILITY_PRICE}, R2.UTILITY_TYPE=#{R2.UTILITY_TYPE}, R2.SUPPLY_SIZE=#{R2.SUPPLY_SIZE}, R2.REAL_SIZE=#{R2.REAL_SIZE}, R2.ROOM_FLOOR=#{R2.ROOM_FLOOR}, R2.STRUCTURES=#{R2.STRUCTURES}, R2.PARKING=#{R2.PARKING}, R2.PET=#{R2.PET}, R2.ELEVATOR=#{R2.ELEVATOR}, R2.BALCONY=#{R2.BALCONY}, R2.BUILT_IN=#{R2.BUILT_IN}, R2.OPTIONS=#{R2.OPTIONS}, R2.LOAN_ACCESS=#{R2.LOAN_ACCESS}, RB.TRADE_STATUS=#{RB.TRADE_STATUS} WHERE R1.ROOM_NUM = R2.ROOM_NUM AND R1.ROOM_NUM = RB.ROOM_NUM AND DEL_GB='N'
update ROOM_FILES set FILE_GB='N' where ROOM_NUM=#{ROOM_NUM}
update ROOM_BOARD set DEL_GB='Y' where BOARD_NUM=#{BOARD_NUM}
update ROOM_FILES set FILE_GB='Y' where ROOM_NUM=#{ROOM_NUM}
update ROOM_BOARD set TRADE_STATUS='광고중' where BOARD_NUM=#{BOARD_NUM}
update ROOM_BOARD set TRADE_STATUS='거래완료' where BOARD_NUM=#{BOARD_NUM}
